an3.27:1.3: Atthi, bhikkhave, puggalo jigucchitabbo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupasitabbo.
an3.27:1.4: Atthi, bhikkhave, puggalo ajjhupekkhitabbo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupasitabbo.
an3.27:1.5: Atthi, bhikkhave, puggalo sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupasitabbo.
an3.27:1.6: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, puggalo jigucchitabbo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupasitabbo?
an3.27:1.7: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo dussilo hoti papadhammo asuci sankassarasamacaro paticchannakammanto, assamano samanapatinno, abrahmacari brahmacaripatinno, antoputi avassuto kasambujato.
an3.27:1.8: Evarupo, bhikkhave, puggalo jigucchitabbo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupasitabbo.
an3.27:1.10: Kincapi, bhikkhave, evarupassa puggalassa na ditthanugatim apajjati, atha kho nam papako kittisaddo abbhuggacchati:
an3.27:1.12: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, ahi guthagato kincapi na damsati, atha kho nam makkheti;
an3.27:1.13: evamevam kho, bhikkhave, kincapi evarupassa puggalassa na ditthanugatim apajjati, atha kho nam papako kittisaddo abbhuggacchati:
an3.27:1.15: Tasma evarupo puggalo jigucchitabbo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupasitabbo.
an3.27:2.1: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, puggalo ajjhupekkhitabbo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupasitabbo?
an3.27:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo kodhano hoti upayasabahulo,
an3.27:2.3: appampi vutto samano abhisajjati kuppati byapajjati patitthiyati, kopanca dosanca appaccayanca patukaroti.
an3.27:2.4: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, duttharuko katthena va kathalaya va ghattito bhiyyoso mattaya asavam deti;
an3.27:2.6: seyyathapi, bhikkhave, tindukalatam katthena va kathalaya va ghattitam bhiyyoso mattaya ciccitayati citicitayati;
an3.27:2.8: seyyathapi, bhikkhave, guthakupo katthena va kathalaya va ghattito bhiyyoso mattaya duggandho hoti;
an3.27:2.9: evamevam kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco puggalo kodhano hoti upayasabahulo,
an3.27:2.10: appampi vutto samano abhisajjati kuppati byapajjati patitthiyati, kopanca dosanca appaccayanca patukaroti.
an3.27:2.11: Evarupo, bhikkhave, puggalo ajjhupekkhitabbo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupasitabbo.
an3.27:2.13: Akkoseyyapi mam paribhaseyyapi mam anatthampi mam kareyyati.
an3.27:2.14: Tasma evarupo puggalo ajjhupekkhitabbo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupasitabbo.
an3.27:3.1: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, puggalo sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupasitabbo?
an3.27:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo silava hoti kalyanadhammo.
an3.27:3.3: Evarupo, bhikkhave, puggalo sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupasitabbo.
an3.27:3.5: Kincapi, bhikkhave, evarupassa puggalassa na ditthanugatim apajjati, atha kho nam kalyano kittisaddo abbhuggacchati:
an3.27:3.7: Tasma evarupo puggalo sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupasitabbo.
an3.27:3.8: Ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo puggala santo samvijjamana lokasminti.
